Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap
public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing one map within the system. The system can have multiple maps, and Actors can move between them. Only the map that the player is currently on will be displayed, but Actors on all maps will be queried on each turn for their moves -- that is, time does not stop when the player leaves a map. It's important to put the GameMap in the World before using it.

    • GameMap

      public GameMap​(GroundFactory groundFactory, char groundChar, int width, int height)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      groundFactory - Factory to create Ground objects
      groundChar - Symbol that will represent empty Ground in this map
      width - width of the GameMap, in characters
      height - height of the GameMap, in characters

    • GameMap

      public GameMap​(GroundFactory groundFactory, java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines)
      Constructor that creates a map from a sequence of ASCII strings.
      Parameters:
      groundFactory - Factory to create Ground objects
      lines - List of Strings representing rows of the map

    • GameMap

      public GameMap​(GroundFactory groundFactory, java.lang.String mapFile) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor that reads a map from file.
      Parameters:
      groundFactory - Factory to create Ground objects
      mapFile - Name of a file containing an ASCII representation of a level
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when file I/O fails

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(Display display)
      Display the current GameMap. Draws Actors, then locations. These need to be printed in rows because that's the way the console works.
      Parameters:
      display - Display that will draw the state of the game

      Parameters:

      y - Y coordinate

      the Location at (x, y)

      Parameters:

      newLocation - the Actor's destination
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if another Actor is already at that Location

      public boolean isAnActorAt​(Location location)

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
